name: Vegan
description: Diet excluding meat, varying in inclusion of other animal products.

name: Gluten-free
description: Diet excluding gluten, a mixture of proteins found in wheat and related grains.

name: Lactose-free
description: Diet excluding lactose, the sugar found in milk and dairy products.

name: Paleo
description: Diet based on foods presumed to have been available to Paleolithic humans.

name: Kosher
description: Diet adhering to Jewish dietary laws and regulations.

name: Halal
description: Diet adhering to Islamic dietary laws and regulations.

name: Pescatarian
description: Diet that includes fish and other seafood but excludes meat.

name: Nut-free
description: Diet excluding nuts and their derivatives.

name: Soy-free
description: Diet excluding soy and soy-based products.

name: Raw food
description: Diet consisting of uncooked and unprocessed food.

name: Low-carb
description: Diet low in carbohydrates and high in protein and fat.

name: Vegetarian
description: Diet excluding meat but may include other animal products.

name: Organic
description: Diet consisting of foods produced without synthetic fertilizers or pesticides.

name: Sugar-free
description: Diet excluding added sugars and sweeteners.

name: Low-sodium
description: Diet low in sodium and high in other nutrients.

name: Mediterranean
description: Diet based on traditional eating habits of Mediterranean countries.

name: Low-fat
description: Diet low in fat and high in other nutrients.

name: Flexitarian
description: Diet that is primarily vegetarian but occasionally includes meat.

name: Allergen-free
description: Diet excluding common food allergens such as peanuts, eggs, and shellfish.

name: High-fiber
description: Diet high in dietary fiber, promoting digestive health.
